医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新模型预测使用顺铂的癌症患者的肾损伤风险研究人员开发了一种新模型，可以预测接受顺铂治疗的患者的严重急性肾损伤，并结合低镁血症等因素来改善患者护理和治疗结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/New-model-predicts-kidney-injury-risk-in-cancer-病人-on-cisplatin.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/New-model-predicts-kidney-injury-risk-in-cancer-病人-on-cisplatin.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75e50fac-0bfb-4b80-abca-86608b8aa2a5 Wed, 03 Apr 2024 01:18:00 -0400 New model predicts kidney injury risk in cancer patients on cisplatin
废水研究揭示了追踪大麻使用挑战研究人员探索基于废水的监测（WBS）作为监测大麻使用的工具，确定分析挑战和对更精确方法的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Wastewater-study-sheds-light-on-tracking-cannabis-use-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Wastewater-study-sheds-light-on-tracking-cannabis-use-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3bbf8544-e94d-44a4-9cf4-3116e25b392a Wed, 03 Apr 2024 00:55:00 -0400 Wastewater study sheds light on tracking cannabis use challenges
研究表明，某些孕激素与女性较高的脑肿瘤风险有关研究发现，长期使用特定孕激素会增加女性患良性脑肿瘤的风险，而短期使用和其他孕激素则不会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Certain-progestogens-linked-to-higher-brain-tumor-risk-in-women-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Certain-progestogens-linked-to-higher-brain-tumor-risk-in-women-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb1c6a0c-fc98-4450-aa10-545e5b8a37e2 Wed, 03 Apr 2024 00:17:00 -0400 Certain progestogens linked to higher brain tumor risk in women, study suggests
Bio-Rad 推出首个用于临床研究中乳腺癌突变检测的超灵敏多重数字 PCR 检测方法生命科学研究和临床诊断产品领域的全球领导者 Bio-Rad Laboratories, Inc. 今天宣布推出其首款超灵敏多重数字 PCR 检测方法——ddPLEX ESR1 突变检测试剂盒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Bio-Rad-launches-first-ultrasensitive- Multiplexed-digital-PCR-assay-for-breast-cancer-mutation-detection-in-clinical-research。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Bio-Rad-launches-first-ultrasensitive- Multiplexed-digital-PCR-assay-for-breast-cancer-mutation-detection-in-clinical-research。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7632b6d-53d5-4e45-a958-f1e17c665779 Wed, 03 Apr 2024 00:16:00 -0400 Bio-Rad launches first ultrasensitive multiplexed digital PCR assay for breast cancer mutation detection in clinical research
大规模研究表明，均衡饮食与更好的大脑健康和认知能力有关利用英国生物银行数据的研究确定了四种饮食模式，揭示与无淀粉、素食或高蛋白低纤维饮食相比，均衡饮食亚型可促进卓越的认知功能和心理健康结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Balanced-diet-linked-to-better-brain-health-and-cognition-large-scale-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Balanced-diet-linked-to-better-brain-health-and-cognition-large-scale-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7eab8c0-64e1-40e5-a735-14e3badeccfb Wed, 03 Apr 2024 00:02:00 -0400 Balanced diet linked to better brain health and cognition, large-scale study shows
全身炎症指数：自身免疫性疾病管理的新希望测量患者炎症水平的常规血液检查可以改善多种使人衰弱的自身免疫性疾病的早期诊断和治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240402/Systemic-Inflammation-Index-A-new-hope-for-autoimmune-disease-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240402/Systemic-Inflammation-Index-A-new-hope-for-autoimmune-disease-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e19a40b-14a0-4f68-81f8-73da1b0d00b1 Tue, 02 Apr 2024 23:57:00 -0400 Systemic Inflammation Index: A new hope for autoimmune disease management
由于培训差距，医疗保健专业人员努力解决儿童肥胖问题最新研究表明，由于缺乏培训和能力，医生们感到无法解决日益严重的儿童肥胖问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240402/Healthcare-professionals-struggle-to-address-childhood-obesity-due-to-training-gap.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240402/Healthcare-professionals-struggle-to-address-childhood-obesity-due-to-training-gap.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44e3ba0f-7409-462c-9965-3d95ffb7bf9b Tue, 02 Apr 2024 23:53:14 -0400 Healthcare professionals struggle to address childhood obesity due to training gap
赢取限量版 EVOLVE 手动移液器入门包INTEGRA Biosciences 很高兴赠送 10 个定制印刷的 EVOLVE 手动移液器入门包，它们一定能为任何实验室增添色彩。限量版 EVOLVE 入门包具有独特的设计，包含高效和高精度移液所需的一切。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240402/Win-a-limited-edition-EVOLVE-manual-pipette-starter-pack.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240402/Win-a-limited-edition-EVOLVE-manual-pipette-starter-pack.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4339bdc3-bed6-4842-b3b2-52777dbaf392 Tue, 02 Apr 2024 23:53:00 -0400 Win a limited edition EVOLVE manual pipette starter pack
即使孕妇适量饮酒也可能影响婴儿的产前发育新墨西哥大学的研究人员发现，即使孕妇少量至适量饮酒也可能导致婴儿产前发育发生微妙的变化，包括出生身长缩短和妊娠持续时间缩短。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240402/Even-moderate-alcohol-use-by-pregnant-病人-may-affect-babies-prenatal-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240402/Even-moderate-alcohol-use-by-pregnant-病人-may-affect-babies-prenatal-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4f39d3d-1201-4cb3-8369-fdb6ff3f7dd0 Tue, 02 Apr 2024 23:49:33 -0400 Even moderate alcohol use by pregnant patients may affect babies' prenatal development
酶的原子级结构模型提供疾病见解当 DNA 或 RNA 等核酸在细胞质中积聚时，就会向免疫系统发出警报。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240402/Atomic-level-structural-models-of-enzymes-provide-disease-insights.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240402/Atomic-level-structural-models-of-enzymes-provide-disease-insights.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0529f672-4fc3-47ee-9b82-d3f2a1742d18 Tue, 02 Apr 2024 23:42:02 -0400 Atomic-level structural models of enzymes provide disease insights
